transcript.text: I along with thousands millions of other
Christians messy annex religious people
were convinced that America's best days
were behind her as recently as last
shadow Pentecost I have even made a
video talking about all the abominations
of the United States of America how the
church was asleep house in was running
rampant and that judgment was at the
door and I was convinced that Yahweh God
was about to bring his hammer of
judgment and fierce anger upon this
nation and I saw the signs everywhere
the decaying infrastructure the policies
the destructive policies of our
government President Obama of the
Congress the rampant sin in the
homosexual move
so many just evil things happen to this
country and so I knew that destruction
was coming and yet although I wept like
Jeremiah the Prophet and tears seeing
this nation on its path toward
destruction suddenly those tears of
sadness and grief have turned into joy
I know that not one man can save
everything I know only Yahshua the
Messiah will put everything to right
when he returns to rule but all of a
sudden this man Donald J Trump enters
into the fray of politics and he starts
speaking truth and hope he starts
talking about reversing the destructive
policies of both Republicans and
Democrats of turning back NAFTA so that
our manufacturing jobs can return of
building wall like Israel has to keep
out illegal immigration of auditing the
Fed and reversing taxes he's not part of
the global agenda he's not part of the
NWO he's not part of the Illuminati he
actually wants to expose all this evil
and suddenly I realized as Yahweh heard
the prayers and cries of his people the
prayer of second Chronicle 714 is he
decided to once again allow a time and
season of revival of returning back to
our roots as Yahweh allowed hope to
return and I realize yes yes Yahweh has
brought up Donald J Trump to bring back
hope to this land
